name: Pixel Force 像素特工队
description:
This is a series of works, the work still uses the game of Turn-based, here you will experience unprecedented game of Turn-based.

Each level is not a fixed level terrain, what does that mean? Each level you choose a different tape will have different customs clearance way! Surprised or not? No surprise?

At present, we are still in the demo development stage. We uploaded a battle video. We will update the home page from time to time. If you are interested in the games of our development team, please join our official Q group: 604176435, or pay attention to our home page:https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35211540-Singi%2527s-Workshop/
